sqlMap.select: select ACTIVITY_ID as activityId, TASK_ID as taskId, TASK_NAME as taskName, UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, CREATED_BY as createdBy, EMPLOYEE_ID as employeeId, EMPLOYEE_NAME as employeeName, EMPLOYEE_CODE as employeeCode, ACTIVITY_DESC as activityDesc, IS_COMPLETED as isCompleted, CREATE_DATE as createDateInString, UPDATE_DATE as updateDateInString from vactivity where task_id = #id#
